articles.title: WATCH: Lea Salonga, Daniel Padilla, other Filipino stars join 'Stop All Hate' campaign - ABS-CBN News
articles.description: Filipino stars have lent their voices to a campaign that aims to end violence against Asians in America.
articles.content:
MANILA -- Filipino stars have lent their voices to a campaign that aims to end violence against Asians in America and other parts of the world. 
Called #StopAllHate, the campaign is in line with a g… [+1194 chars]
